summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Rally Dashboard overlay application. Tested all major features including setup page CRUD operations, overlay scenes, keyboard shortcuts, time formatting, and real-time updates. Most features working correctly with minor issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Go Live button doesn't automatically open overlay in new tab
ui_bugs.workaround: Overlay page accessible directly via /overlay URL

integration_issues.issue: DOM elements become detached during page reload in automated tests
integration_issues.note: This appears to be a testing-specific issue, not affecting normal user interaction

passed_tests: Setup page loads with dark background and white text
Chroma key selection (Green, Blue, Black, Custom colors)
Tab navigation between Pilots, Stages, Times, Config
Pilot CRUD operations (Add, Edit, Delete, Toggle Active status)
Stage CRUD operations with SS numbers, types, and start times
Time matrix with MM:SS.decimal formatting
Export configuration functionality
All 5 overlay scenes accessible via keyboard shortcuts (1-5)
Scene 1: Live Stage with stream grid layout
Scene 2: Timing Tower with status separation
Scene 3: Leaderboard with stage selector
Scene 4: Pilot Focus with pilot and stage selectors
Scene 5: SS Comparison with bar chart visualization
Real-time polling mechanism (500ms intervals)
Chroma key background working in overlay
Invalid keyboard shortcuts correctly ignored
LocalStorage data persistence (pilots, stages, times)
Time input validation and MM:SS.decimal mask formatting
Active/inactive pilot stream toggle functionality
Current stage selection and display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Go Live button to properly open overlay in new tab using window.open() or target='_blank'. The button click event may need to be updated to handle new tab creation correctly.
